original_solution_mapping.L1: He has sold a total of 5 + 7 = <<5+7=12>>12 chocolate bars so far.
original_solution_mapping.L2: James needs to sell 18 - 12 = <<18-12=6>>6 more chocolate bars.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 4141.
    Returns: the number of chocolate bars James still needs to sell.
    """
    # L1
    sold_last_week = 5 # sold 5 last week
    sold_this_week = 7 # sold 7 this week
    total_sold = sold_last_week + sold_this_week

    # L2
    total_to_sell = 18 # 18 chocolate bars to sell
    needed_to_sell = total_to_sell - total_sold

    # FA
    answer = needed_to_sell
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: He has sold a total of {sold_last_week} + {sold_this_week} = <<{sold_last_week}+{sold_this_week}={total_sold}>>{total_sold} chocolate bars so far.
James needs to sell {total_to_sell} - {total_sold} = <<{total_to_sell}-{total_sold}={needed_to_sell}>>{needed_to_sell} more chocolate bars.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: He has sold a total of 5 + 7 = <<5+7=12>>12 chocolate bars so far.

explanation: Incorrect final answer. An intermediate value 'total_sold' (value: 12) was reported instead of 'needed_to_sell' (value: 6).
